tool_description:
1. Query cloudflare guarded website via axios or curl directly
2. Query websocket, socket.io url via POST (send message unsupported yet)
3. Can be used as rotate proxy, save more compare to residential proxy (brightdata, oxylabs, etc)!
4. Allow better anonymity for further data crawling and analysis.
name: Cloudflare Proxy
title: Cloudflare Proxy

api_list.name: GET - Passive Bypass / Rotate Proxy
api_list.description:
Can be used to query cloudflare guarded website via axios or curl directly
Optional header: Px-IP (can be used to forge request_ip - ipv4 only)
^ It only work with web app that check X-Forwarded-For, True-Client-IP, X-Real-IP, CF-Connecting-IP headers.

api_list.name: SOCKET - Post Socket Url (without message params)
api_list.description:
Query websocket, socket.io url via POST (send message unsupported yet)
Only single request with url at the moment.

Optional header: Px-IP (can be used to forge request_ip - ipv4 only)
^ It only work with web app that check X-Forwarded-For, True-Client-IP, X-Real-IP, CF-Connecting-IP headers.
